# titleAlignment

**Instance Property**

The alignment of the title.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var titleAlignment: NSTextAlignment { get set }
```

## Discussion

The alignment can be one of the following values: `NSLeftTextAlignment`, `NSCenterTextAlignment`, or `NSRightTextAlignment`. The default alignment is `NSRightTextAlignment`.

## Accessing a Cell’s Title

- **attributedTitle**: The title of the cell as an attributed string.
- **title**: The cell’s title text.
- **titleBaseWritingDirection**: The default writing direction used to render the form cell’s title.
- **titleFont**: The font used to draw cell’s title.
- **titleWidth**: The width of the title field.
